info.title: Pactus APIs
info.description:
Each node in the Pactus network can be configured to use the [gRPC](https://grpc.io/) protocol for communication.
Here you can find the list of all gRPC methods and messages.

All the amounts and values in gRPC endpoints are in NanoPAC units, which are atomic and the smallest unit in the Pactus blockchain.
Each PAC is equivalent to 1,000,000,000 or 10<sup>9</sup> NanoPACs.

get.summary: BLSPublicKeyAggregation aggregates bls public keys.

parameters.name: publicKeys
parameters.description: The public keys to aggregate.

get.summary: BLSSignatureAggregation aggregates bls signatures.

parameters.name: signatures
parameters.description: The signatures to aggregate.

get.summary: SignMessageWithPrivateKey signs message with provided private key.

parameters.name: privateKey
parameters.description: The private key to sign the message.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The message to sign.

get.summary: VerifyMessage verifies signature with public key and message.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The signed message.

parameters.name: signature
parameters.description: The signature of the message.

parameters.name: publicKey
parameters.description: The public key of the signer.

get.summary:
GetAccount retrieves information about an account based on the provided
address.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address of the account to retrieve information for.

get.summary:
GetBlock retrieves information about a block based on the provided request
parameters.

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: The height of the block to retrieve.

parameters.name: verbosity
parameters.description:
The verbosity level for block information.

 - BLOCK_DATA: Request only block data.
 - BLOCK_INFO: Request block information and transaction IDs.
 - BLOCK_TRANSACTIONS: Request block information and detailed transaction data.

get.summary: GetBlockHash retrieves the hash of a block at the specified height.

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: The height of the block to retrieve the hash for.

get.summary: GetBlockHeight retrieves the height of a block with the specified hash.

parameters.name: hash
parameters.description: The hash of the block to retrieve the height for.

get.summary: GetBlockchainInfo retrieves general information about the blockchain.
GetConsensusInfo retrieves information about the consensus instances.

GetPublicKey retrieves the public key of an account based on the provided
address.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address for which to retrieve the public key.

get.summary: GetTxPoolContent retrieves current transactions in the transaction pool.

parameters.name: payloadType
parameters.description:
The type of transactions to retrieve from the transaction pool. 0 means all
types.

 - UNKNOWN: Unknown payload type.
 - TRANSFER_PAYLOAD: Transfer payload type.
 - BOND_PAYLOAD: Bond payload type.
 - SORTITION_PAYLOAD: Sortition payload type.
 - UNBOND_PAYLOAD: Unbond payload type.
 - WITHDRAW_PAYLOAD: Withdraw payload type.

get.summary:
GetValidator retrieves information about a validator based on the provided
address.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address of the validator to retrieve information for.

get.summary:
GetValidatorByNumber retrieves information about a validator based on the
provided number.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: The unique number of the validator to retrieve information for.

get.summary: GetNetworkInfo retrieves information about the overall network.

parameters.name: onlyConnected
parameters.description: If true, returns only peers that are currently connected.

get.summary: GetNodeInfo retrieves information about a specific node in the network.

put.summary: BroadcastTransaction broadcasts a signed transaction to the network.

parameters.name: signedRawTransaction
parameters.description: The signed raw transaction data to be broadcasted.

get.summary:
CalculateFee calculates the transaction fee based on the specified amount
and payload type.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The amount involved in the transaction, specified in NanoPAC.

parameters.name: payloadType
parameters.description:
The type of transaction payload.

 - UNKNOWN: Unknown payload type.
 - TRANSFER_PAYLOAD: Transfer payload type.
 - BOND_PAYLOAD: Bond payload type.
 - SORTITION_PAYLOAD: Sortition payload type.
 - UNBOND_PAYLOAD: Unbond payload type.
 - WITHDRAW_PAYLOAD: Withdraw payload type.

parameters.name: fixedAmount
parameters.description: Indicates if the amount should be fixed and include the fee.

get.summary: GetRawBondTransaction retrieves raw details of a bond transaction.

parameters.name: lockTime
parameters.description:
The lock time for the transaction. If not set, defaults to the last block
height.

parameters.name: sender
parameters.description: The sender's account address.

parameters.name: receiver
parameters.description: The receiver's validator address.

parameters.name: stake
parameters.description: The stake amount in NanoPAC. Must be greater than 0.

parameters.name: publicKey
parameters.description: The public key of the validator.

parameters.name: fee
parameters.description: The transaction fee in NanoPAC. If not set, it is set to the estimated fee.

parameters.name: memo
parameters.description: A memo string for the transaction.

get.summary: GetRawTransferTransaction retrieves raw details of a transfer transaction.

parameters.name: lockTime
parameters.description:
The lock time for the transaction. If not set, defaults to the last block
height.

parameters.name: sender
parameters.description: The sender's account address.

parameters.name: receiver
parameters.description: The receiver's account address.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The amount to be transferred, specified in NanoPAC. Must be greater than 0.

parameters.name: fee
parameters.description: The transaction fee in NanoPAC. If not set, it is set to the estimated fee.

parameters.name: memo
parameters.description: A memo string for the transaction.

get.summary: GetRawUnbondTransaction retrieves raw details of an unbond transaction.

parameters.name: lockTime
parameters.description:
The lock time for the transaction. If not set, defaults to the last block
height.

parameters.name: validatorAddress
parameters.description: The address of the validator to unbond from.

parameters.name: memo
parameters.description: A memo string for the transaction.

get.summary: GetRawWithdrawTransaction retrieves raw details of a withdraw transaction.

parameters.name: lockTime
parameters.description:
The lock time for the transaction. If not set, defaults to the last block
height.

parameters.name: validatorAddress
parameters.description: The address of the validator to withdraw from.

parameters.name: accountAddress
parameters.description: The address of the account to withdraw to.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The withdrawal amount in NanoPAC. Must be greater than 0.

parameters.name: fee
parameters.description: The transaction fee in NanoPAC. If not set, it is set to the estimated fee.

parameters.name: memo
parameters.description: A memo string for the transaction.

get.summary:
GetTransaction retrieves transaction details based on the provided request
parameters.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the transaction to retrieve.

parameters.name: verbosity
parameters.description:
The verbosity level for transaction details.

 - TRANSACTION_DATA: Request transaction data only.
 - TRANSACTION_INFO: Request detailed transaction information.

get.summary: CreateWallet creates a new wallet with the specified parameters.

parameters.name: walletName
parameters.description: The name of the new wallet.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: The password for securing the wallet.

get.summary: GetAddressHistory retrieves the transaction history of an address.

parameters.name: walletName
parameters.description: The name of the wallet.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address to retrieve the transaction history for.

get.summary: GetAddressInfo return address information.

parameters.name: walletName
parameters.description: The name of the wallet to generate a new address.

get.summary: GetNewAddress generates a new address for the specified wallet.

parameters.name: walletName
parameters.description: The name of the wallet to generate a new address.

parameters.name: addressType
parameters.description:
The type of address to generate.

 - ADDRESS_TYPE_TREASURY: Treasury address type.
Should not be used to generate new addresses.
 - ADDRESS_TYPE_VALIDATOR: Validator address type.
 - ADDRESS_TYPE_BLS_ACCOUNT: Account address type with BLS signature scheme.
 - ADDRESS_TYPE_ED25519_ACCOUNT: Account address type with Ed25519 signature scheme.
Note: Generating a new Ed25519 address requires the wallet password.

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: A label for the new address.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Password for the new address. It's required when address_type is ADDRESS_TYPE_ED25519_ACCOUNT.

get.summary: GetTotalBalance returns the total available balance of the wallet.

parameters.name: walletName
parameters.description: The name of the wallet to get the total balance.

get.summary: GetTotalStake return total stake of wallet.

parameters.name: walletName
parameters.description: The name of the wallet.

get.summary:
GetValidatorAddress retrieves the validator address associated with a
public key.

parameters.name: publicKey
parameters.description: The public key for which the validator address is requested.

get.summary: GetWalletInfo return wallet information.
ListAddress return list address in wallet.
ListWallet return list wallet name.
LoadWallet loads an existing wallet with the given name.

parameters.name: walletName
parameters.description: The name of the wallet to load.

get.summary: RestoreWallet restores an existing wallet with the given mnemonic.

parameters.name: walletName
parameters.description: The name of the wallet to restore.

parameters.name: mnemonic
parameters.description: The mnemonic for wallet recovery.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: The password for securing the wallet.

patch.summary: SetAddressLabel set label for given address.

parameters.name: walletName
parameters.description: The name of the wallet to generate a new address.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: The password for unlocking the wallet for signing.

get.summary: SignMessage signs an arbitrary message.

parameters.name: walletName
parameters.description: The name of the wallet.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: The password for unlocking the wallet for signing.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The account address associated with the private key.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The arbitrary message to be signed.

get.summary: SignRawTransaction signs a raw transaction for a specified wallet.

parameters.name: walletName
parameters.description: The name of the wallet used for signing.

parameters.name: rawTransaction
parameters.description: The raw transaction data to be signed.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: The password for unlocking the wallet for signing.

get.summary: UnloadWallet unloads a currently loaded wallet with the specified name.

parameters.name: walletName
parameters.description: The name of the wallet to unload.

data.description: The serialized data of the account.

number.description: The unique number assigned to the account.

balance.description: The balance of the account in NanoPAC.

pactusAccountInfo.description: Message containing information about an account.

publicKey.description: The public key associated with the address.

label.description: A label associated with the address.

path.description: The Hierarchical Deterministic path of the address within the wallet.

pactusAddressType.description:
Enum for the address type.

 - ADDRESS_TYPE_TREASURY: Treasury address type.
Should not be used to generate new addresses.
 - ADDRESS_TYPE_VALIDATOR: Validator address type.
 - ADDRESS_TYPE_BLS_ACCOUNT: Account address type with BLS signature scheme.
 - ADDRESS_TYPE_ED25519_ACCOUNT: Account address type with Ed25519 signature scheme.
Note: Generating a new Ed25519 address requires the wallet password.

address.description: The aggregated public key account address.

pactusBLSPublicKeyAggregationResponse.description: Response message containing the aggregated public key.

pactusBLSSignatureAggregationResponse.description: Response message containing the aggregated signature.

prevBlockHash.description: The hash of the previous block.

stateRoot.description: The state root hash of the blockchain.

sortitionSeed.description: The sortition seed of the block.

proposerAddress.description: The address of the proposer of the block.

pactusBlockHeaderInfo.description: Message containing information about the header of a block.

pactusBlockVerbosity.description:
Enumeration for verbosity levels when requesting block information.

 - BLOCK_DATA: Request only block data.
 - BLOCK_INFO: Request block information and transaction IDs.
 - BLOCK_TRANSACTIONS: Request block information and detailed transaction data.

id.description: The unique ID of the broadcasted transaction.

pactusBroadcastTransactionResponse.description: Response message containing the ID of the broadcasted transaction.

fee.description: The calculated transaction fee in NanoPAC.

pactusCalculateFeeResponse.description: Response message containing the calculated transaction fee.

committers.description: List of committers in the certificate.

absentees.description: List of absentees in the certificate.

pactusCertificateInfo.description: Message containing information about a certificate.

pactusConnectionInfo.description: ConnectionInfo contains information about the node's connections.

address.description: The address of the consensus instance.

active.description:
Indicates whether the consensus instance is active and part of the
committee.

height.description: The height of the consensus instance.

round.description: The round of the consensus instance.

votes.description: List of votes in the consensus instance.

pactusConsensusInfo.description: Message containing information about a consensus instance.

pactusCounterInfo.description: CounterInfo holds data regarding byte and bundle counts.

pactusCreateWalletResponse.description: Response message containing the mnemonic for wallet recovery.

pactusGetAccountResponse.description: Message containing the response with account information.

historyInfo.description: Array of history information for the address.

pactusGetAddressHistoryResponse.description: Response message containing the address transaction history.

pactusGetBlockHashResponse.description: Message containing the response with the block hash.

pactusGetBlockHeightResponse.description: Message containing the response with the block height.

data.description: Block data, available only if verbosity level is set to BLOCK_DATA.

prevCert.description: Certificate information of the previous block.

txs.description:
List of transactions in the block, available when verbosity level is set to
BLOCK_TRANSACTIONS.

pactusGetBlockResponse.description: Message containing the response with block information.

lastBlockHeight.description: The height of the last block in the blockchain.

lastBlockHash.description: The hash of the last block in the blockchain.

totalAccounts.description: The total number of accounts in the blockchain.

totalValidators.description: The total number of validators in the blockchain.

totalPower.description: The total power of the blockchain.

isPruned.description: If the blocks are subject to pruning.

pruningHeight.title: Lowest-height block stored (only present if pruning is enabled)

lastBlockTime.title: Timestamp of the last block in Unix format

pactusGetBlockchainInfoResponse.description: Message containing the response with general blockchain information.

proposal.description: The proposal of the consensus info.

pactusGetConsensusInfoResponse.description: Message containing the response with consensus information.

pactusGetNetworkInfoResponse.description: Response message containing information about the overall network.

walletName.description: The name of the wallet from which the address is generated.

addressInfo.description: Information about the newly generated address.

pactusGetNewAddressResponse.description: Response message containing the newly generated address.

agent.description: Version and agent details of the node.

startedAt.description: Time the node was started (in epoch format).

services.description: Bitfield representing the services provided by the node.

servicesNames.description: Names of services provided by the node.

localAddrs.description: List of addresses associated with the node.

protocols.description: List of protocols supported by the node.

clockOffset.description: Offset between the node's clock and the network's clock (in seconds).

pactusGetNodeInfoResponse.description: Response message containing information about a specific node in the network.

publicKey.description: The public key associated with the provided address.

pactusGetPublicKeyResponse.description: Message containing the response with the public key.

id.description: The unique ID of the transaction.

pactusGetRawTransactionResponse.description: Response message containing raw transaction data.

totalBalance.description: The total balance of the wallet in NanoPAC.

pactusGetTotalBalanceResponse.description: Response message containing the available balance of the wallet.

pactusGetTotalStakeResponse.description: Response return total stake in wallet.

blockHeight.description: The height of the block containing the transaction.

blockTime.description: The UNIX timestamp of the block containing the transaction.

pactusGetTransactionResponse.description: Response message containing details of a transaction.

txs.description: List of transactions currently in the pool.

pactusGetTxPoolContentResponse.description: Response message containing transactions in the transaction pool.

address.description: The validator address associated with the public key.

pactusGetValidatorAddressResponse.description:
Response message containing the validator address corresponding to a public
key.

pactusGetValidatorAddressesResponse.description: Message containing the response with a list of validator addresses.

pactusGetValidatorResponse.description: Message containing the response with validator information.

payloadType.description: The payload type of the transaction.

amount.description: The amount involved in the transaction.

pactusHistoryInfo.description: Message containing transaction history information for an address.

walletName.description: The name of the loaded wallet.

pactusLoadWalletResponse.description: Response message containing the name of the loaded wallet.

MessageSent.description: Number of sent bundles categorized by message type.

MessageReceived.description: Number of received bundles categorized by message type.

pactusMetricInfo.description: MetricInfo contains data regarding network actvity.

publicKey.description: The public key of the validator.

address.description: The validator address associated with the sortition proof.

amount.description: The amount to be transferred in NanoPAC.

pactusPayloadType.description:
Enumeration for different types of transaction payloads.

 - UNKNOWN: Unknown payload type.
 - TRANSFER_PAYLOAD: Transfer payload type.
 - BOND_PAYLOAD: Bond payload type.
 - SORTITION_PAYLOAD: Sortition payload type.
 - UNBOND_PAYLOAD: Unbond payload type.
 - WITHDRAW_PAYLOAD: Withdraw payload type.

validator.description: The address of the validator to unbond from.

validatorAddress.description: The address of the validator to withdraw from.

accountAddress.description: The address of the account to withdraw to.

status.description: Current status of the peer (e.g., connected, disconnected).

agent.description: Version and agent details of the peer.

consensusKeys.description: List of consensus keys used by the peer.

consensusAddresses.description: List of consensus addresses used by the peer.

services.description: Bitfield representing the services provided by the peer.

lastBlockHash.description: Hash of the last block the peer knows.

lastSent.description: Time the last bundle sent to the peer (in epoch format).

lastReceived.description: Time the last bundle received from the peer (in epoch format).

protocols.description: List of protocols supported by the peer.

totalSessions.description: Total download sessions with the peer.

completedSessions.description: Completed download sessions with the peer.

pactusPeerInfo.description: Information about a peer in the network.

blockData.description: The block data of the proposal.

signature.description: The signature of the proposal, signed by the proposer.

pactusProposalInfo.description: Message containing information about a proposal.

walletName.description: The name of the restored wallet.

pactusRestoreWalletResponse.description: Response message containing the name of the restored wallet.

pactusSignMessageResponse.description: Response message containing the available balance of the wallet.

pactusSignMessageWithPrivateKeyResponse.description: Response message containing the generated signature.

transactionId.description: The ID of the signed transaction.

pactusSignRawTransactionResponse.description: Response message containing the transaction ID and signed raw transaction.

id.description: The unique ID of the transaction.

lockTime.description: The lock time for the transaction.

value.description: The value of the transaction in NanoPAC.

fee.description: The fee for the transaction in NanoPAC.

memo.description: A memo string for the transaction.

publicKey.description: The public key associated with the transaction.

pactusTransactionVerbosity.description:
Enumeration for verbosity levels when requesting transaction details.

 - TRANSACTION_DATA: Request transaction data only.
 - TRANSACTION_INFO: Request detailed transaction information.

walletName.description: The name of the unloaded wallet.

pactusUnloadWalletResponse.description: Response message containing the name of the unloaded wallet.

data.description: The serialized data of the validator.

publicKey.description: The public key of the validator.

number.description: The unique number assigned to the validator.

stake.description: The stake of the validator in NanoPAC.

lastBondingHeight.description: The height at which the validator last bonded.

lastSortitionHeight.description: The height at which the validator last participated in sortition.

unbondingHeight.description: The height at which the validator will unbond.

availabilityScore.description: The availability score of the validator.

pactusValidatorInfo.description: Message containing information about a validator.

isValid.description: Indicates if the signature is valid (true) or not (false).

pactusVerifyMessageResponse.description: Response message containing the resualt of validation of signature and message.

blockHash.description: The hash of the block being voted on.

round.description: The consensus round of the vote.

cpRound.description: The change-proposer round of the vote.

cpValue.description: The change-proposer value of the vote.

pactusVoteInfo.description: Message containing information about a vote.

pactusVoteType.description:
Enumeration for types of votes.

 - VOTE_UNKNOWN: Unknown vote type.
 - VOTE_PREPARE: Prepare vote type.
 - VOTE_PRECOMMIT: Precommit vote type.
 - VOTE_CHANGE_PROPOSER: Change proposer vote type.
